ai.summary: A gentle, beginner-friendly 5 km walk in East Sussex, UK, offering pleasant countryside scenery and easy paths suitable for families and first-time hikers.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly easy terrain: flat or gently rolling with a mix of surfaced lanes, gravel tracks, and grassy paths. Some uneven ground and occasional muddy patches after rain; a few stiles or gates may be encountered.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast and wear sturdy footwear. Stay on public rights of way and be mindful of livestock. Yield to cyclists and horses where appropriate. Carry a map or offline GPS, a light layer and waterproofs, and enough water and snacks. Keep track of daylight hours and have a plan to shorten or stop if conditions worsen. In case of emergency, call 999/112.
recommended_gear: Lightweight waterproof jacket and a warm layer

seo.title: Download Discovery Walk, East Sussex – Easy 5 km Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore a gentle 5 km walk in East Sussex, UK. Easy terrain, countryside scenery, practical tips, gear suggestions, and safety notes for a comfortable day out.
